section.content: Here comes another installment of the newsletter; hold on to your hats!

section.title: Welcome one and all!
section.content:
January brought us a record number of new groups members along with setting a new monthly post record of 142! The group is now 179 members and is still growing. To all of the new members, I say welcome and hope to hear from you soon.

Here are a few quick links you might want to bookmark:
The group's homepage
File archive for the group (contains scripts, wallpapers, and more!)
Photo archive for the group (a great place to upload your fanart)
Link archive for the group

section.title: Cagliostro Fan Commentary
section.content: I mentioned this last month, but it deserves another mention so the new members can benefit as well. As a Xmas present to all Lupin and Cagliostro fans, Chris Meadows has recorded a commentary track for the film. The track is filled with trivia about the film, Arsene Lupin, and much more. The track is an mp3 file that you can download here.

section.title: Adult Swim & the Pioneer Dub
section.content:
We are now well into the Adult Swim broadcast run of Lupin, and the opinions of the dub have been mixed. Most of the feedback I have been reading on message boards have been favorable towards it. People feel the dub cast is doing a great job, and they also are comfortable with the liberties Pioneer has taken with the dub translation.

What do you guys think about the new dub? Post away and let's see if we can break 200 messages in this short month!

section.title: Upcoming Releases
section.content:
Funimation will be releasing Dragon of Doom a.k.a. Zantetsuken on 11 Feb. and Voyage To Danger a.k.a. Orders to Assassinate Lupin on 20 May.

Pioneer will be releasing the second TV DVD Love Heist on 11 March. The third DVD still has not been given a new release date.

Animeigo has given Fuma a new release date of 7 April. Let's hope that it sells well so we can get Legend of the Gold of Babylon on DVD shortly after that.

Tokyopop has volume 2 of the manga slated for a 4 February release with volume 3 slated for a 8 April release.

Has anyone found a new release date for the Japanese GameCube game that was supposed to be released in December?

Keep an eye out for the US release of the Lupin toys. I have not seen a release date posted for them yet, but I imagine we will see them soon now that Lupin is on TV regularly.

section.title: Parting Words
section.content:
While we will get our Lupin fix on a steady basis this year, the only interesting news I can see on the horizon will be the announcement of this year's summer TV special. I am looking forward to seeing if they can build on the success of last year's special.

Once again, welcome to all the new members. Maybe next month, I can get Reed to write the newsletter so everyone can get to know him a bit better. :)

See you in twenty-eight days!
